question: Which statement is describing climate?
candidate_answers: (A) It snowed 12 centimeters last night. (B) Last winter was colder than normal. (C) There is a thunderstorm watch for the local area. (D) The temperature will be between 32°C and 37°C all week.
answer: The temperature will be between 32°C and 37°C all week.
label: D
